title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1200.5.2 - Responsibilities of a subordinate lawyer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1200.5.2 - Responsibilities of a subordinate lawyer

State Regulations
(a) A lawyer is bound by these Rules
notwithstanding that the lawyer acted at the direction of another
person. (b) A
subordinate lawyer does not violate these Rules if that lawyer acts in
accordance with a supervisory lawyer's reasonable resolution of an arguable
question of professional duty. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
1200.5.2. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
